NL System Query: Switch to this board, can I put the pieces somewhere else and maintain the win?
User Response: Yes, you can just put them on the first row, the second row, or the third row.

NL System Query: Switch to this board, can I move the pieces to the first column?
Switch to this board, can I rotate the pieces by some degrees?
User Response: Sure, you can rotate them by ninety degrees.

NL System Query: Switch to this board, can I put the pieces somewhere else and still have a win?
User Response: Yup, you can put them on the first column or the third column.

NL System Query: Switch to this board, can I remove the second piece to the left hand side?
User Response: No, that will break the win.
